channel.title: Help with server crasher
channel.description:
ok i am not sure what the hell this is if its syipkpker or not but someone named vnawvnaw and qoopqoop logged on to my server and it traded me and everyone on server it also send a dueling request and it crashes server, i dunno if syiblocker will help it leaves no char file with no ip so i cant do nothing how do i fix it!
and sorry if this is wrong section i just want something that blocks it..

item.title: Help with server crasher
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

chill chill chill it just a question plus i know what he said i am makeing a client before i use 317 again…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 12:44:39 am[/size][hr]thank you those who tryed to help ;D

but those who fought take a chill pill

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server crasher
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“WiredScape, post:21, topic:280579”]Obviously you have no clue what this bot is. It’s not SYI and the connections are always from a diffrent IP address. Who is the retard now? The only way to stop it is to limit the players alloud in server to 1.

THE IP ADDRESS IS ALWAYS DIFFRENT!

THIS IS NOT AN SYIPKPKER BOT[/quote]
Did I tell him to limit connections per ip to 1?
No, I didn’t, so shut the fuck up. Idiots.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server crasher
item.dc:creator: @WiredScape WiredScape
item.description:
@WiredScape wrote:

Obviously you have no clue what this bot is. It’s not SYI and the connections are always from a diffrent IP address. Who is the retard now? The only way to stop it is to limit the players alloud in server to 1.

THE IP ADDRESS IS ALWAYS DIFFRENT!

THIS IS NOT AN SYIPKPKER BOT

item.title: Help with server crasher
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:19, topic:280579”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=370596.msg2801679#msg2801679 date=1243472077]
But he misunderstood me because he’s a retard, so I cba to explain it to him.
[/quote]

Here’s a simple fix for retards: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286718.0.html[/quote]
I’ve given that link to everyone who has requested it, and none of them understood it, even though it’s made very simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server crasher
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:15, topic:280579”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=370596.msg2800843#msg2800843 date=1243373872]

Just prevent the idiot from crashing your server. It’s better than waiting for him to log on so you can get his IP and then ban him.

wow your a genious??? HE USES MULTIPLE IP’s AND MULTIPLE UID’s… i love geniouses like u
[/quote]
Any where in the thread does it say that?

@Topic: Only allow connections from a specific client.[/quote]

CoonHunter:

yea… im in process of getting all of his IP adreses… so far i have about 10…

But he misunderstood me because he’s a retard, so I cba to explain it to him.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server crasher
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

WiredScape:

What if we don’t have our own client hm?

I didn’t know people still use SILAB. GET A DAMN CLIENT.

@topic: Do what JC said. Limit the number of connections from your client.
